actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide that the Federal medical assistance percentage shall be 100 percent with respect to amounts expended as medical assistance for illegal aliens.

summary.text: Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to set the Federal assistance percentage for the Medicaid costs of illegal aliens at 100 percent.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide that the Federal medical assistance percentage shall be 100 percent with respect to amounts expended as medical assistance for illegal aliens.
